source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Twisted Appendage

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 9.5 million damage and pulsing 468,538 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Blastmaster3000

spells.description: Use: Launch a random number of deadly grenades at your enemies, each dealing 233,948 Fire damage split between nearby targets caught in the blast. (1 Min Cooldown)

description: Could be single, maybe double, or if you're lucky, TRIPLE explosions!

spells.description:

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
